record.title: TRIBUTE TO SENATOR THOMAS
record.narrative:
TRIBUTE TO SENATOR THOMAS -- (Senate - July 23, 2007)

[Page: S9772]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that an Albert Caswell tribute entitled "The Promise of Thomas" be printed in the RECORD.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the material was ordered to be printed in the RECORD, as follows:
